meanings.definition: A skirt that falls to the middle of the calf.
meanings.sent1: She wore a stylish midiskirt to the party.
meanings.sent2: The midiskirt was a popular fashion choice in the 1970s.
meanings.sent3: The midiskirt danced around her legs as she twirled on the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: Her midiskirt was like a gentle wave as she walked down the street.
meanings.sent5: The midiskirt swayed elegantly with each step she took.

meanings.sent1: She decided to midiskirts to the office today.
meanings.sent2: I midiskirts whenever I go out with my friends.
meanings.sent3: He midiskirts to show off his new shoes.
meanings.sent4: They midiskirts confidently at the fashion show.
meanings.sent5: We midiskirts gracefully at the party last night.
